head_description: I'm a self-taught software developer, are you looking for one? Hire me!
about_me_desc_1: I'm a self-taught software developer with knowledge in different languages and technologies useful in everyday at work.
about_me_desc_2: I adapt easily to almost any project, also enjoy learning new things daily that may be useful at another time.
about_me_desc_3: I'm very sociable and friendly, i try to make work time more enjoyable in order to improve team communication.
project_nextchat_mobile_desc: NextChat is a privacy-focused and easy-to-use social messaging network.
project_nongoose_rust_desc: Nongoose is an ODM for MongoDB build with Rust.
